data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the genus Sangaris Dalman in South America (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae), with description of two new species and new combinations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A., Monné, Marcela L. (2009): Synopsis of the genus Sangaris Dalman in South America (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae), with description of two new species and new combinations. Zootaxa 2230: 29-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275195
